38831417.review:
Let me start this off by saying I liked the game so much on my friends computer that I bought it to play on my own.  I would have been willing to pay about 3-7$ for this game, if it works.

Now the real reason I put the "do not recommend:" the game refuses to open.  I can get to the page where I can select resolution and whether it is windowed or not (I cannot change resolution or anything except for the windowed or not part), but this makes no difference.  I can select windowed, hit play, and the game will proceed to open, play the (amazing) music, but just shows a black screen when I hover over the icon in the taskbar.  If I click this icon, nothing happens.  I have tried restarting my computer, uninstalling and reinstalling, verifying cache integrity, and looking online for something I might have missed.  I DO want to play this game, badly, but without being able to play it I cannot give a good review.  I feel these issues might have to do with windows 10, but I'm not sure.  If you have a solution or an update that would fix this, I am watching for updates and am waiting for a response to this review.

UPDATE - I got it to work, but I had to go into my own settings and change the resolution of my monitor.  In windows 10, this game refuses to work on 1366 by 768 pixels.  I made my screen 6 pixels more narrow, and forced floppy heroes to give me more options resolution-wise, and so it gave me a resolution that I am able to use.   This is a bug, but it no longer prevents me from playing the game.  Great game - 8/10

37112211.review:
Превосходная игра по шикарной цене. Проходится быстро (все ачивки за 5 часов), но оставляет приятные впечатления.

Плюсы:
+Врядли вы играли во что-то подобное. Геймплей весьма увлекательный и оригинальный. Обязательно стоит сыграть ради новых впечатлений!
+Элементы рогалика заставят попотеть (умер - начинай сначала, но некоторый прогресс идет даже после поражения)
+Прекрасная физика, к хитбоксам никаких претензий, багов не замечено, оптимизация норм
+Кастомизация и прокачка в одном флаконе! Уиииии! Огромный выбор снаряжения на любой вкус!
+ИИ не такой уж и дYрак. Фаерболлом раз или пикой в глаз?
+Элементарнейшее управление в 5 клавиш на клавиатуре или геймпаде, основанное на физике инерции предметов. Вы разберетесь! Главное, не сдавайтесь :D
+Пройдете игру раньше, чем она Вам надоест

Минусы:
-Управление персонажем, с одной стороны, простое, но не очень интуитивное. Минимум обучения. Легко разобраться, но выходит не сразу =)
-Очень короткая (100% за 5 часов). Стоит своих денег, но хочется увидеть продолжение с большим количеством контента! Словно это демоверсия еще более крутой игры или маленький эксперимент перед началом франшизы. MOAAAARRRRRRR
-Фоновая музыка веселая и отлично подходит, но треков мало, и она приедается через пару часов
-Локальный мультиплеер только на одном компьютере (насколько я помню). Игруха была бы топовой, будь в ней игра по сети

Сам геймплей бесполезно описывать, тк Вы быстрее соберете деньги на игру, чем я придумаю хорошую рецензию. Лучше сразу сыграть!

35536614.review:

总的来说，这款游戏十分有趣味性和操作性（转起来好难控制啊。。）
游戏内有各种各样的装备与武器，还能与线下的朋友进行boss的对战，十分有趣（boss战建议关掉受伤时的画面减速..）
无中文，无线上，无卡牌，不过游戏本身还是十分nice的，强烈推荐（最后一个成就好难啊..）

34220314.review:
[h1]Compra justificada si puedes sacarle provecho al multijugador local.[/h1]

Juego casual (sin más pretensiones) que, tiene como principal premisa batirnos en una "arena" integrando efectos de física (muñeco de trapo y gravedad) para, así ofrecernos divertidas y cortas partidas.

A mi parecer su compra está más que justificada si tienes la posibilidad de explotar el multijugador local, de resto no veo viable su compra, aunque su precio es generoso y está a la par de lo que ofrece este pequeño indie, no considero que deba comprarse meramente por la experiencia pve; a lo sumo te dará 3 o 4 horas antes de que te canses.

-Уровни

Кажется всё.

32180088.review:
9/10 - Great game! 
I don't usually review games but I had to give some positive feedback on this. 
First off it's playable on every computer (I have played without lag on my 6 year old school laptop @ Intel(R) Core(TM) i5 CPU M 430  @ 2.27GHz with integrated Intel HD graphics). 
I bought this for around 4€ for couch gaming and was just gonna try it. I ended up playing 3 hours single player in a day which is alot for me. 
It's like Starwhal but with weapons/armor and shooting. 

The only thing that could be better is more weapons and armor. 
The rest is as good as it gets.

32135150.review:
神经病和强迫症以及幻想症停不下来的游戏。
明明觉得里面人物四肢扭曲，在空间里以一个不可思议的物理形态不断扭曲，可一旦接受了这种设定还会感觉迷之带感。甚至脑海里会不断脑补斩杀敌人之后的优美弧线和落地姿势。
看着敌人脑袋飞走，留下噗噗喷血的躯体，看着敌人被主角手持巨剑砍的盔甲尽脱四肢断裂，拼着还剩一血的脑袋瞬息反杀数名敌人~这都是爽快之处。有了这些，就连什么鬼一样的操作方式，也显得特别有味道了呢~

30184136.review:
如果你对这个游戏感兴趣，不妨先看看我的视频(video):
《基友玩什么》第七期
http://v.youku.com/v_show/id_XMjUyNzU4MjA0NA==.html

一个价格实惠，但是非常不起眼的游戏，如果有在线联机那一定能小火一把
单人游戏都如此魔性，我们联机起来更加无比激（ji）情
游戏目的就是把对方斩首，不过玩着玩着就变18禁脱衣游戏了
一边旋转一边把对方的衣服打落..........
游戏有几十种武器可以让你选择，衣服也有N多套。你可以搭配出几百种组合
装甲越厚，安全性越高，机动性不过就要差些了
所以你要选什么搭配，要看你自己的手感
如果你有固定基友，入手吧
我是大丁丁，我们下个评测见~

29755403.review: 好游戏，游戏内容可以消磨4到10个小时。游戏建议前期全用来开双手武器，双手出了一个能分裂5个的法杖再升级法杖。同时要优先购买和升级头盔。头盔升完了然后升级护腿，然后是护臂，最后是护甲。游戏玩了一次就能体验全部内容了，以后估计也不会再打开了。总的来说这个价格值得全价入正

29551585.review:
Floppy Heroes nasce da una idea semplice e, forse, già vista: omini fluttuanti con fisica simil ragdoll (ma in due dimensioni) che si prendono a mazzate corpo a corpo o con armi a proiettili come archi o scettri magici. Tutto qui.

Dove sta il voto molto positivo? Intanto partiamo da ciò che ci appare: per così pochi euro ci troviamo davanti ad una grafica disegnata semplice e pulita. Le musiche sono molto belle, seppur poche, e davvero un plauso al compositore. L'editing del personaggio potrebbe essere più dettagliato ma non è difficile farsi strappare un sorriso da certi omini colorati di viola con capelli verdi. Il catalogo degli equipaggiamenti è stato di recente aggiornato avendo possibilità di scegliere tra 18 armi per categoria e si possono fare molte combinazioni!

Il gameplay vero e proprio si svolge su un campo vuoto (qualcuno ha degli elementi per pararsi e qualcuno ha elementi che modificano le caratteristiche dell'omino, tipo testa o arma gigante) con un massimo di 6 giocatori (il caos totale). Qui bisogna semplicemente prendersi a ceffoni fino alla morte. Il fatto che sia tutto così "mollo" lo rende esilarante e con amici è uno spasso, assicurato. Si può anche giocare in modalità gigante, quindi fare una partita 3v1 per esempio, anche questa molto divertente.

La modalità single player è scarna e consta di 10 livelli in cui gli avversari diventano sempre più forti. Battendoli prendiamo esperienza e prendendo esperienza prendiamo le chiavi per sbloccare gli equipaggiamenti. Essendo un gioco semplice anche il single player è semplice, ma ribadisco che costa poco e il divertimento viene con gli amici.

In definitiva per me merita di essere preso, soprattutto se lo sviluppatore aggiornerà con altri contenuti. Io ho deciso di dare fiducia al gioco!

Make a hero, upgrade your gear, do local-couch-coop.
This game is exactly what i wanted.
I'd like it if you could color the armor pieces to an extant, but hey, it's only 3 bucks and that is pretty amazing.
I measure games with 1$ per played hour.
So this game is definetly well worth it.

But yes, this is a very good time killer.

29134244.review:
1.这游戏很简单的操作，上下左右加上远程武器的射击。但是却异常的好玩。
2.游戏有单人模式（一共十关，敌人不断增强，但每次游戏敌人的装备是随机的），和自定义模式，自定义模式分为组队战模式，泰坦战模式（几个小人打一个泰坦）和锦标赛模式（几个人分组胜者晋级，败者淘汰，最后决出冠军），自定义模式里可以调整重力，血量，速度等游戏性。
3.可惜的是目前没有出现在线多人模式。
4.4小时全成就。用的是死骑的套装和双手武器红色长弓，很变态。
5.装备需要开箱子开出来，开箱子需要钥匙，随着你的闯关就能获得钥匙，人物可以自定义，装备可以自己随意配，装备可以用钥匙来升级，获得各种属性的增强。钥匙非常容易获得。
推荐给大家喽！

原理は不明だが宙をくるくる飛び回る戦士を操作して戦うゲーム

キャラクターメイクと装備を整えてCPUとのバトル
バトルに勝利することで装備開放と装備強化の出来るポイントを手に入れることができる

防具は一概にはこれが強い！と言うものはないが
頭か体をふっ飛ばされると死ぬのでそのへんは硬くて強いやつがいいと思う
武器は敵と当たってもダメージを受けないのでその辺を考慮するといいかもしれない

マルチプレイはローカルだけなのでCPU戦を一通りクリアしたら
あとは装備のアンロックぐらいしかやることがない

-要するに-
両手弓（大）を持って相手をハメ殺しにしよう！

・追記
実績全解除しました
全装備のアンロックは比較的簡単でしたが
ただ一つだけヘルメットなしでCPU戦をクリアしろというのがあって、それだけちょこっと大変でした（やれば出来るくらいの難易度）

Замечательная игра!
Многие люди жалуются что управление неудобное и игра не стоит своих денег.
Я с этим не согласен. Да управление и вправду неудобное, но к нему быстро привыкаешь, а 
80 рублей за игру, я считаю, что это просто копейки)))
Из минусов могу отметить что игра слишком лёгкая прошёл с 3 раза, также в игре очень мало оружий!

Прошёл я так: Одел только самый крутой шлем и взял длинный лук который закрывает половину тела!
В игре 10 раундов, но также есть мультиплеер (нет, не по интернету а просто вдвоём с другом) 
в нём можно самому создать лвл.
Вообщем рекомендую!

26740488.review:
Хорошая игра, определённо стоит того, чтобы её приобрести. Довольно часто в неё залипаю ночами, ибо мышкой там можно не щелкать, а значит домочадцы спят спокойно :D
Очень нравится сама идея - бои в невесомости с отрубанием конечностей.
Было бы не плохо добавить режимов ещё каких ни будь, а так же новой брони и оружия, но игрушке меньше полугода, авось ещё выпустят обновку-другую...
Единственный минус - начинает слегка лагать, когда играешь в какие ни будь бои типа 1 великан против 5ти воинов. Везде летает броня, кровь и остатки тел, у каждого своя юнитивская физика и всё это сильно грузит стареньку пеку .3.

26570963.review:
Thumbs UP!

Floppy Heroes is genuinely fun and an excellent local multiplayer romp as it sits but this game could be so much more...

It just needs more weapons, armour, characters, levels with explosive barrels and destructable objects, powerups, rideable mounts, dragons, trolls, online multiplayer, and co-op horde mode.  I really see a future for this game if the devs keep updating and/or release some excellent DLC.  I would gladly pay 10 times the asking price if the game continues to be updated.  Such a fun game!

26007752.review:
在老菊的视频里看到的游戏，一玩就停不下来了，目前还剩最后一个不用头盔通关的成就没拿。

别看这个游戏不大，画面也偏卡通，但是整个游戏过程中都充斥着快感和紧张的氛围，配合上不错的打击音效，感觉整个人都燃起来了，最有快感的就是用弓箭在远处瞄准命中 NPC 的头部，配合那个刺中的音效简直不要更爽。

我通关用的组合式里面中等重量但是血很厚的那一套蓝色铠甲和双手武器里的那把红色的弓箭，个人感觉双手的远程武器都比较强，比如第一把 3-2-1 的弓箭，还有 5-1-4 的那把炸裂法杖都是比较强的，近程武器的话我比较喜欢双持黑色那把单手剑，一前一后有奇效；走位方面要善用墙边和反弹，用好了可以大概控制瞄准的方向，对远程武器很有用。

最后希望这个游戏赶快出在线联机模式啊，这个游戏一看就是要一众基友一起玩比较带感，但是室友们都不是很感兴趣就很难受 T T

We need online multiplayer mode !!!

25932942.review:
I find that I'm having to fall back on the capalist's argument, i.e. "is it worth the asking price?" In the case of Floppy Heroes, I suppose it is, since it's only about two dollars. You swing your boneless levitating warrior around the battlefield with less-than-intuitive controls, wildly swinging whatever weapon(s) you picked up from the amorphous pile in the start menu. There's a pretty big selection of weapons to choose from, but in practice, most weapons feel indistinguishable from most of the other weapons in their category. The stats on display are really vague and hardly worth noting, but none of that matters because there's only one weapon worth choosing and I'm not telling you which.

Still, the game can provide enjoyment for a few minutes at a time, so long as you spread out your play sessions with a few hours in between. And again, the game only costs two bucks, so yeah, you can check it out if you want, I guess.

25926231.review:
看了老菊的视频来玩，已经通关但根本停不下来。

 一点点奇技淫巧： 建议武器长弓，游戏中判定是打到武器的任何部位都算格挡，没有伤害，但武器的任何部位都有攻击判定。射不准根本无所谓，长弓正好是一个笼罩玩家整个正面的弧形，可以帮你抵挡任何来自正面的攻击。但是敌人自己戳到长弓的任何部位（甚至是弓柄）都会有被打判定(想象你手持一个巨大的刺盾)。开局往墙角一缩，护好头部，慢慢就能猥琐死所有敌人，顺利通关。

25554746.review:
[b]Yes it stanks of mobile, and yes it's dumb. BUT it's also very cheap, very addicting, and does have some complexity with the strategy.[/b]

[i]Essentially, this game is played with one-button-and-one-stick where you floatily try to kill other people.[/i] You do your worst to try to get the other people to fly or float into your weapon. There are lots of weapons and armor to unlock, and they all are kinda functionally different, too. Some weapons shoot things (where the one-button comes into play).

[b]I think anyone who plays this for about three minutes would see the charm and one-more-game kind of appeal.[/b]

#YouCouldDoWayyyyWorsefor3Bucks

25527504.review:
This is an instant-recommend.  For this low price, you CAN NOT go wrong here. I played for over an hour in my first session, and the time flew by.  This is one of those "one more try" sort of games, where you're SURE you can do better if you just have one more run and try harder.  Plus, I'm sure the multiplayer will be a blast the next time I can get a friend to come over.

Do any of you guys remember a little game called "Ragdoll Masters" from like 10 or 15 years ago?  It's kinda like that, but better, and cheaper.  Seriously, that game still costs 10 bucks and you can't even get it on Steam.  This is $3 (or $2.09 if you bought it during the first week like I did) and I would have gladly paid $10 for it.

The Basics:
--
So the premise of this game, (and RM, which I'm sure served as some inspiration) is that you control a floppy ragdoll of a character in a zero-G arena.  The way you move determines your rotation and the positioning of your limbs based on a simple but elegant physics engine.  The goal is to beat your enemies to death, while keeping yourself from getting hurt too much.  Blows to the head are the key to victory, and you certainly want to keep your own head out of harm's way as much as possible.

What's new:
--
So I said that this game seems to take a lot of inspiration from "Ragdoll Masters" but what makes it better?  Well, the biggest thing is the armor and weapons. 

Armor makes you slower and clumsier, depending on what type you wear, and how many pieces.. but it will soak up some hits for you, before it gets too damaged and falls off.

Weapons come in 1-handed and 2-handed varieties.. you can carry any combination of 2 1-handed weapons if you desire (such as two swords, a shield and a mini-crossbow, an axe and a magic wand, etc), or a single 2-handed weapon, such as a large melee weapon, a bow and arrow, a magic staff, or a freakin CANNON. 

There are many types of armor and weapons to unlock, each with their own playstyles and strengths (particularly the weapons).

Perhaps the coolest thing about the armor and weapons is that it adds variety to the enemies you face in the singleplayer mode.  Instead of just 1v1, 1v2, 1vGiant, 1v2 harder dudes, 1v3, 1v2 giants, etc.. you get a bit more variety because their armor and weapons will be randomized each time.  The enemies in a given round might spawn with completely different weapons than last time, which will greatly alter how you fight them.

Conclusion:
--
This is kind of a big review for a very inexpensive game.  You don't need me to sit here and ramble on any further.  I think it's great, I think you should try it, end of story.

I mean, it's not some epic end-all-be-all game of the year 2016 or whatever.. but will you get a lot of casual fun for your couple of dollars?  I think so, definitely.

25501579.review:
A smashing evolution of an old formula. People who've played and enjoyed Ragdoll Masters, Ragdoll Kung Fu, Hammerfall, and other turn-of-the-century physics-based beat-em-ups will recognize the excellence of this title immediately. 

For the uninitiated, you control a ragdoll character in a puppet fashion, flailing their weapons toward enemy weak points. In this game, armor provides some resistance to damage before falling off entirely, and further damage to un-armored limbs will result in dismemberment. Armor can provide offensive capabilities as well, which one-ups previous titles of this kind. An armored boot beats a bare skull, and even limbs holding weapons can be lopped off for proper disarming. Ranged weapons are included, and seem pretty fairly balanced with their limitations of reload speed and aiming precision. You can block with your weapons, as well as equip shields in your off-hand.

There is some character customization available, aside from gear you can also customize hair/skin/facial features and their respective colorings. The weapons and armor can't be recolored, however. Weapons can be held in reverse grip as well as standard, adding more depth to the loadout. Customized loadouts can be saved and loaded as the situation demands. 

Single player is a 10-match affair, your custom character versus ten assorted combinations of foes in varying gear and sizes. Wins unlock keys, which unlock more gear. There's no storyline, no excess reading, just heavy metal and the clash of steel. 

Upside:
Quick and painless to drop in or out of
Simple to learn, truly impressive when skill meets talent
Great advances over previous niche titles
Local MP includes some different modes, as well as customizable gravity and move speed
Plenty of weapon variety/possible loadouts
Dirt cheap game, I paid $2.09

Downside:
No female floppies
Can't customize gear appearance, just character
AI is fairly easy, didn't see difficulty options
Game is short, All achievements in first day/3hrs ingame
Music is repetitive, limited selection of tracks
Graphics are a bit like Flash games on Kongregate or Newgrounds in style (YMMV)
*Damage is not affected by movement speed, damage dealt is based on gear vs weapon. So a weapon that deals three damage to an unarmored head, will always deal three damage, whether rebounding lightly off the opponent's sword or being swung down with the wrath of heaven.

In the end, Floppy Heroes totally delivers at its price point. I highly recommend this as yet another way to smack your friends around the house, and I hope the developer continues to hone their talents and release either updates or sequels, which I'd be happy to invest in.

Note: Other games you might like include the original, Ragdoll Masters(10$ from dev site), Swordy (E.A.15$), Hammerfight (5$ on steam, abandonware, formerly called Hammerfall), and Rag Doll Kung Fu(10$ on steam).

*denotes my biggest fault found with this game
